pkgmetadata.longdescription: Metabolomic Quantitative Trait Locus Mapping for 1H NMR data // mQTL.NMR provides a complete mQTL analysis pipeline for 1H NMR data. Distinctive features include normalisation using most- used approaches, peak alignment using RSPA approach, dimensionality reduction using SRV and binning approaches, and mQTL analysis for animal and human cohorts.
